column6: A new law is passed in the New World outlawing super-powered individuals. Can Peter keep his new powers a secret in a place that needs a Spider-Man so badly? Can Bruce Banner escape the hulking beast who hides in his fear and anger?
column8: | colorist:Morry Hollowell | letterer:Todd Klein | inker:Mark Morales | writer:Greg Pak | penciller:Greg Tocchini | penciller (cover):Sergio Toppi
